cab.content: ^ (/-SflgRET... From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 11th September 1917.(Received at India Office, 8.0 p.m.)Secret. . Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Governor of Khost is said to have sent message from Kabul that Jajis will be punished and must be restrained from further attacks on Kuram. Mangal lashkar reported bent on effecting settlement between Jajis and Turis. - . \Recruitment during August totals 22,000. No change in the general military situation in India or Afghanistan. \
